parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: If true and the appropriate sheet format anchor point exists, then insert table at this point; if false, then use the values specified for the X and Y arguments as the insertion point

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the weldment cut-list table; valid only if UserAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of the weldment cut-list table; valid only if UseAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBomConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Name of the "As Welded" configuration for the weldment cut-list table

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

title: IView.InsertWeldmentTable
description: Inserts a weldment cut-list table into this drawing view.
signature:
WeldmentCutListAnnotation InsertWeldmentTable( 
   System.Boolean
UseAnchorPoint
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Int32
AnchorType
,
   System.String
Configuration
,
   System.String
TableTemplate
)

parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: If true and the appropriate sheet format anchor point exists, then insert table at this point; if false, then use the values specified for the X and Y arguments as the insertion point

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the weldment cut-list table; valid only if UserAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of the weldment cut-list table; valid only if UseAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBomConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Name of the "As Welded" configuration for the weldment cut-list table

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

remarks:
The weldment cut-list table template installed with SOLIDWORKS is <
SOLIDWORKS_
install_dir
>\
lang
\<
language
>\
cut list.sldwldtbt
.
